request(event)

[ show source ]

     # File activeresource/lib/active_resource/log_subscriber.rb, line 3
3:     def request(event)
4:       result = event.payload[:result]
5:       info "#{event.payload[:method].to_s.upcase} #{event.payload[:request_uri]}"
6:       info "--> %d %s %d (%.1fms)" % [result.code, result.message, result.body.to_s.length, event.duration]
7:     end
